About Us
About Florida's First Coast of Golf
Florida’s First Coast of Golf, Inc. is a non-profit organization, designed to promote Amelia Island, Jacksonville and The Beaches, St. Augustine, Ponte Vedra & The Beaches, Clay County and Palm Coast & The Flagler Beaches as the premier destination for Florida golf vacations.
We also partner with Jacksonville Aviation Authority, THE PLAYERS, and the World Golf Village, along with the region’s golf courses & accommodations partners.
.imageBackgroundLoader
General Information
Founded in 1992, Florida’s First Coast of Golf was formed by tourist boards, lodging properties and golf courses to showcase Northeast Florida as a top golf destination.
Marketing, advertising and public relations are administered by an employed staff located in Jacksonville Beach, Florida. The main objective of this staff is to be the trusted source for golf travel information to the Northeast Florida.
Partnering properties and a professional golf travel service staff provide
Golf Packages
and
Tee Time
booking services.
.imageBackgroundLoader

World Golf Village
Celebrate the game’s best when you book a World Golf Village vacation package. From top-rated resort accommodations to two award-winning championship courses designed by golf legends, St. Augustine's World Golf Village has everything you’re looking for in your next golf vacation.

Media Resources
Writing a story about your visit to Northeast Florida? Check out the destination's latest happenings, photos and videos, destination history and fun facts and endless story opportunities.
.imageBackgroundLoader
Where Florida Golf Begins
Golf was introduced to Northeast Florida in 1895 in St. Augustine and began to thrive in 1916 when Donald Ross constructed the Ponce de Leon Golf and Country Club.
100+
miles of beautiful beaches make up the coast from Amelia Island, Jacksonville and The Beaches, St. Augustine, Ponte Vedra & The Beaches, Clay County, and Palm Coast & The Flagler Beaches.
71
golf courses and
1,278
holes of golf can be found on Florida’s First Coast. They cover more than
488,000
yards. Area courses have been designed by the world’s best including Dye, Fazio, Nicklaus, Palmer, Player, Ross, and Weed. Nearly 20 PGA TOUR and Champions Tour players live on Florida’s First Coast of Golf, including Vijay Singh.
Read More

Media Kit
Our media kit includes general information about Florida's First Coast of Golf, area courses, accommodations and other general information.
Take a tour through our Media Library showcasing each of our 5 unique destinations golf courses and hotel/resort imagery and videos.
Need captivating pictures to go with that great travel feature? FFCG is pleased to offer high-quality, high-resolution, photos for editorial use. Simply email us at the email address below and we will organize the delivery of the images for you. Please feel free to contact us if you require additional information or have any questions.
Florida’s First Coast of Golf
Office: 904 249-0585
Email:
jenna@fla-golf.org

Home
About Us
Our Team
Our Team
Learn about the leadership of Florida's First Coast of Golf.
.imageBackgroundLoader
David Reese, President
Meet David Reese, the globetrotting guru of the travel industry! With over three decades of experience in development, marketing, and regional tourism, he's basically a walking travel encyclopedia. David's passion for serving others shines through in his work as the leader of a team of supercharged professionals who are the golf tourism agency of record in NE Florida. He's dedicated to making sure that everyone from the visitors who flock to the area each year to the hardworking stakeholders who make it all possible are taken care of. When he's not jet-setting around the world, David's priority is serving others. Whether it's helping tourists find the perfect spot for a round of golf or making sure that the local economy is thriving, he's always putting others first. So if you're looking for someone who knows the ins and outs of the travel industry and is passionate about making a difference, David Reese is your guy!
.imageBackgroundLoader
.row
.layout
.split-text-image__upper
Jenna Craven, Director of Sales & Marketing
Meet Jenna, our Director of Sales & Marketing. With nearly a decade at Florida's First Coast of Golf, Jenna combines innovative strategies and data-driven insights to create impactful marketing campaigns that drive results. Her collaborative approach with golf courses, hotels, and strategic partners, along with her focus on storytelling and precision, has fostered partnerships that have thrived for over 20 years.
.imageBackgroundLoader
.row
.layout
.split-text-image__upper
Brett Thomason, Golf Tourism Marketing Coordinator
Meet Brett, our Golf Tourism Marketing Coordinator and resident expert on all things "fore!" With a love for the game that borders on obsession, Brett is always ready to tee off on the next project. When Brett isn't busy coordinating the companies marketing efforts, she can be found on the greens, perfecting her swing. Brett has a knack for turning bogeys into birdies and driving engagement with their creative marketing ideas. They know how to hit the sweet spot when it comes to connecting with golf enthusiasts and attracting tourists to beautiful Northeast Florida. So if you're looking for someone to help take your golf game – or your golf business – to the next level, look no further than Brett, our Golf Tourism Marketing Coordinator.

Home
About Us
Executive Committee & Board
Executive Committee & Board
Our Board of Directors is comprised of dedicated leaders who bring a wealth of expertise, experience, and passion to Florida's First Coast of Golf. Their collective vision and strategic guidance drive our mission forward, ensuring we continue to make a meaningful impact in the communities we serve.

Each member of our board plays a vital role in shaping the future of FFCG, providing oversight, and championing initiatives that align with our goals. Together, they help us navigate opportunities and challenges with integrity, innovation, and commitment.

Learn more about the individuals who lead and inspire our organization below.
